rules_text:
When Want to Believe enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
Whenever a cryptid enters under your control, return Want to Believe to its owner’s hand. [i](Aliens, Eldrazi, Horrors, and Mutants are cryptids.)[/i]
notes: If a cryptid was put into your graveyard this way, —> Whenever a cryptid enters, return CARDNAME to hand.
